Text: RE ADS is downnsf Good morning Please see the email below from Keoni Almeida It is VERY IMPORTANT for Real Time to keep a log of any dispatches or realtime changes made outside of ADS It is my understanding that a log is being kept Volume Management needs to know how to access the log as there have been several ADS discrepancies Thanks Donna Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on AM Heather Dunton AM To VolumeManagementPortland cc Subject RE ADS is down Forwarded by Heather DuntonPDXECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Almeida Keoni AM To Dunton Heather cc Subject RE ADS is down Hi Heather we log dispatches in an electronic logging system called SLIC see attached as an example This data is transferred into our system SCs generally log all RT changes on their side and relay this info to their settlements folks You folks may want to do this also as some of your disputes are having to do with RT changes that Im having to pull SLIC logs and forward to Enron when your folks wouldnt need to bother with a dispute if you had this logging information on your end Hope this helps Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From mailto Sent Saturday November AM To Cc Subject ADS is down Keoni when ADS goes down how are these phone call dispatch instructions logged at the ISO Also how do market participants verify and agree upon instructed mw values with no data in the ADS system for these verbal instructions Thanks for your help Heather Forwarded by Heather DuntonPDXECT on AM Embedded Enron Change to SettleTenminuteFTR Flash to accommodate new wheeling charge types Cc po NonPrivilegedpst All On January the CAISO retired charge type Wheeling OutWheeling Through due ISO It was replaced by High Voltage Wheeling Charge due ISO and Low Voltage Wheeling Charge due ISO The charges are allocated to gross exports same as before The difference is the exit location High Voltage Access Charges are accessed for wheeling from transmission facilities with a kV or higher voltage rating while Low Voltage Access Charges are accessed for wheeling from transmission facilities with a kV or lower rating Settle has been changed to capture the new wheeling charge types effective On the top sheet Anna added a couple of cells please see below and changed the logic to make it date effective WHEELING LV TRUE January TRUE Also on the top sheet I changed the Wheeling ID for all low voltage tie points to differentiate between the LV and HV charges please note the change in blue Tie Points Wheeling From ZoneTo Zone BLYTHEWALC SCELV LC SP ELDORDMCLLGH SCE LA SP Ive also updated tblRates in the Settle Database and added the charges to FTRflash If you have any questions please ask Donna
Meter Resubmittals Cc NonPrivilegedpst Jim The files are saved in OPortlandWestdeskVolumeManagementVolumeMgmtMeter Resubmittals Please let me know if you have any questions Donna

FW Definition of Zones Cc po NonPrivilegedpst FYI There is an attachment at the bottom which I find very helpful I have saved it in Renpowercapssettleisoandpxiso zone descriptions Donna Original Message From Almeida Keoni ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAlmeidaCKeoniCKAlmeidacaisoEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday May AM To Johnson Donna Subject RE Definition of Zones Check out the last couple of tabs I will try and find more info that actually describes this terminology Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From Johnson Donna mailtoDonna NRONcom Sent Wednesday May AM To Subject Definition of Zones Hi Keoni Would you please clarify zones for me Heres what I think Congestion Zones are NP SP SF HUMB ZP Load Zones are PGE PGE PGE PGE SCE SDG Tie Point SYLMARNOB Location ID Resource ID Branch Group PATHBG Please provide examples of each and when they would be used What charge types I tried looking in the glossary on your website and wasnt able to find everything Is there someplace else I could look I also reviewed the settlements manual and was unable to clearly answer my questions Thanks for any help you are able to provide Donna TAKEOUTxls

Re CAISO Notice Disbursement of Funds for December InvoiceNonPrivilegedpst Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on AM Jennifer ES PM To Donna CT cc Chris CT Caroline CT Angela ES Subject Re CAISO Notice Disbursement of Funds for December Invoice Donna Can you give me the a percentage that is related to EES The traders at EES is concerned how much cash we are actually receiving from the ISO related to ancillary sales EPMI has made on EES behalf Thanks Jennifer Donna Johnson ECT PM To Jennifer ES cc Chris CT Caroline EmmertHOUECT Subject CAISO Notice Disbursement of Funds for December Invoice Jennifer we received full payment for September and October however for November and December the ISO charged one hundred cents on the dollar and paid partial cents on the dollar Please see the emails below for details on those distributions Hopefully this helps if you need anything else please call me Donna To ISO Market Participants IMCEAEXOCAISOOUCORPORATECNDISTRIBUTIONLISTSCN cc Leiber Phil Grant Colleen Subject CAISO Market Notice November Final Invoice Status ISO Market Participants On Thursday February the ISO was scheduled to settle the November final trueup invoices Payments due and received are summarized below Market Obligations Invoiced Paid on ISO Accounts Payable Available for Distribution Amount Distributed Note Without consideration of previous defaults the ISO was scheduled to distribute The difference between this amount and the which should have been received is a timing difference which would have been funded from an overcollection from the November preliminary invoice absent the market defaults related to the preliminary statement The ISO issued instructions to its bank to distribute today The amount available for distribution was distributed equitably taking into consideration total November charges including preliminary and final invoiced amounts and amounts previously distributed The ISO is currently preparing for distribution to ISO creditors a current certification of amounts owed after all distributions to date Phil Leiber Don Fuller Treasurer Director Client Relations Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on PM Woertz Byron on AM To SC Settlements Contacts IMCEAEXOCAISOOUCORPORATECNDISTRIBUTIONLISTSCN cc Subject CAISO Notice Disbursement of Funds for December Invoice SC Settlements Contacts Cash clearing for preliminary invoices for December was to take place on March The ISO received market related funds totaling from total market receivables of The ISO intends to distribute these funds on March The ISO delayed this distribution to allow us to complete the complex calculations necessary to ensure that all funds are distributed equitably and in accordance with the ISO Tariff In addition PGE transferred net of GMC obligation to the ISO on March Such funds were intended by PGE to satisfy PGE obligations to the ISO through the California Power Exchange The California Power Exchange is the subject of a preliminary injunction Case No CM of the US District Court Central District of California Enron Power Marketing and Enron Corp vs California Power Exchange which provides that CalPX shall not be required to make payments to creditors of CalPX resulting from its clearinghouse function The ISO is discussing with its counsel the appropriate course of action to take in light of this injunction and has placed such funds in a segregated interest bearing account until such a determination has been made Phil Leiber Dir Financial Planning Treasurer California ISO fax Embedded StdOleLink

IMCEAEXOCAISOOUCORPORATECNDISTRIBUTIONLISTSCN cc Leiber Phil Grant Colleen Subject CAISO Market Notice November Final Invoice Status ISO Market Participants On Thursday February the ISO was scheduled to settle the November final trueup invoices Payments due and received are summarized below Market Obligations Invoiced Paid on ISO Accounts Payable Available for Distribution Amount Distributed Note Without consideration of previous defaults the ISO was scheduled to distribute The difference between this amount and the which should have been received is a timing difference which would have been funded from an overcollection from the November preliminary invoice absent the market defaults related to the preliminary statement The ISO issued instructions to its bank to distribute today The amount available for distribution was distributed equitably taking into consideration total November charges including preliminary and final invoiced amounts and amounts previously distributed The ISO is currently preparing for distribution to ISO creditors a current certification of amounts owed after all distributions to date Phil Leiber Don Fuller Treasurer Director Client Relations Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on PM Woertz Byron on AM To SC Settlements Contacts IMCEAEXOCAISOOUCORPORATECNDISTRIBUTIONLISTSCN cc Subject CAISO Notice Disbursement of Funds for December Invoice SC Settlements Contacts Cash clearing for preliminary invoices for December was to take place on March The ISO received market related funds totaling from total market receivables of The ISO intends to distribute these funds on March The ISO delayed this distribution to allow us to complete the complex calculations necessary to ensure that all funds are distributed equitably and in accordance with the ISO Tariff In addition PGE transferred net of GMC obligation to the ISO on March Such funds were intended by PGE to satisfy PGE obligations to the ISO through the California Power Exchange The California Power Exchange is the subject of a preliminary injunction Case No CM of the US District Court Central District of California Enron Power Marketing and Enron Corp vs California Power Exchange which provides that CalPX shall not be required to make payments to creditors of CalPX resulting from its clearinghouse function The ISO is discussing with its counsel the appropriate course of action to take in light of this injunction and has placed such funds in a segregated interest bearing account until such a determination has been made Phil Leiber Dir Financial Planning Treasurer California ISO fax

CAISO MARCH Preliminary Invoice Cc po NonPrivilegedpst Melissa The March ISO Preliminary Invoices are available The totals are as follows Grid Management Due to the ISO by am PST Market Operations Due to the ISO by am PST The ISO is going to invoice EPMI based on a recalculated estimate Please make available for this payment which will still need to go out by May at am Please call me at if you need me to fax the invoices to you or if you have any questions Thanks Donna Johnson Sheidun Volume Management

DC Line Loss for December Cc NonPrivilegedpst Sean The estimated charge for December DC Line Loss for ECTstNW is approximately This number was based on the following The total Line Loss at SYLMARNOB was approximately Mw ECTstNWs allocation was approximately Mw of the total line loss The was derived using ECTstNWs total scheduled exports divided by EPMIs total scheduled exports The rate used was which was the average of the incremental price for December Ive attached a couple of spreadsheets which may be helpful You may look forward to the final numbers for December by May Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Donna x
Reviewers Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Chris I select Caroline Emmert Kit Blair Kourtney Nelson Virginia Thompson I dont really interact with anyone else Donna

Kit Blair Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Chris I just wanted to take a moment to let you know what a great job Kit is doing He is energetic inquisitive and consistently takes the necessary initiative to get the job done He asks all of the right questions especially why which inspires me to tune up my own knowledge and skills It is refreshing to have someone like him join the group and I anticipate that hell be able to handle allocations completely by the end of next week Thank you for your foresight and for the help Donna

TOMORROW Cc po NonPrivilegedpst Hello I wont be in tomorrow until about am Im taking my mother in law to the airport and wanted to use the morning to make sure she had all of her documents and luggage in order I have set to A I still need to process Prior Period Adjustments and I have a couple of adjustments to make to Grid Management Charges As of tonight were stilll on target for the deadline Kit ran all of the tools for which he will begin actualizing tomorrow morning Kourtney and I set off the tools for tonight allexcept Settle Supplemental which has to run last If it turns out that I need to be here earlier than please call me on the cell phone and Ill be head this way Thanks and Ill see you tomorrow Donna

FW Internet mail for Donna JohnsonNonPrivilegedpst FYI Original Message From Mangin Emmanuel Sent Wednesday May AM To Cerantola Ariel Cc Tripp Tracey Johnson Donna Subject RE Internet mail Ariel Donnas notes proxy address in AD had a at the end of her last name That would prevent her from receiving Notes mail as well as Internet mail I fixed the proxy address She should be fine as soon as the changes replicate Thanks E Emmanuel Mangin Outlook Migration Team Lead Emmanuel nroncom Work Pager Original Message From Johnson Donna Sent Wednesday May AM To Mangin Emmanuel Cc Tripp Tracey Subject Internet mail Hi Emmanuel Donna Johnson is having problems receiving internet mail It looks fine in Notes but Icant check mailman Can you please assist her Donnas number is Thanks Ariel

Febuary ISO PreliminaryNonPrivilegedpst Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on AM From Godfrey nronXgate on AM CDT To Donna CT cc Subject Febuary ISO Preliminary Donna The Cal ISO wires in the amount of for Grid Management and for Market Operations has been requested to be paid on Monday April meeting the AM PST deadline Thank you gh

Update October Prelim Actualization Cc NonPrivilegedpst This is the latest have been set to A have been allocated and transferred to oracle Need to do some manual work with Grid and Wheeling before setting to A should take day tomorrow Created the allocation records for Need to transfer to oracle and Set to A I put in hours today and tried really hard to wrap October up tonight I ran into some manual adjustments that took longer to research than I anticipated Were still on tract for getting October out this week Ill stay as long as I physically can tomorrow to complete it The only reason Im leaving now is because Im getting really tired and I want to cherish the Lakers win smile I will give you another update at the Staff meeting tomorrow Donna

Draft Load Deviation Numbers for Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Jennifer Ive attached the spreadsheet for October Please call me if you have any questions Donna Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on AM Donna Johnson AM To Jennifer ES cc Chris CT Murray P O CT Subject Draft Load Deviation Numbers for Hi Jennifer Sorry this took so long We experienced problems while running the October numbers Ive attached spreadsheets which include the Load Deviation numbers for production months September November and December for both EES and PGES I will forward October as soon as calculations are done Please note that the numbers have not been actualized The spreadsheets are draft quality and are for information purposes only Please let me know if you need any additional information or have any questions I can be reached at mobile Thanks Donna Sheidun

FW CAISO NOTIFICATION Amendment AS Manual AdjustmentsNonPrivilegedpst Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on PM Almeida Keoni on PM To Johnson Donna cc Subject FW CAISO NOTIFICATION Amendment AS Manual Adjustments Let me know if you need anything else Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From CRCommunications Sent Thursday March AM To SC Settlements Contacts Subject CAISO NOTIFICATION Amendment AS Manual Adjustments SC SETTLEMENT CONTACTS PLEASE NOTE manual workarounds became effective on trade date AS Soft Caps A delta payment will be entered against the applicable AS charge type for capacity bids accepted above the soft cap CT and The calculation for the delta payment is as follows Billable quantity the automated billable quantity which was paid at the MCP price x the delta price bid price MCP The AS soft cap charge will be allocated to participants who had AS obligation using the applicable AS offset CT The calculation for the AS soft cap charge is as follows Billable quantity the net obligation x price total delta payments total net obligation Comment detail will include the accepted bid price total dollars allocated Replacement Reserve Capacity or Energy An SC will be paid for either Replacement Reserve capacity or Replacement Reserve imbalance energy but not both The capacity payment will be rescinded under CT and credited back to the market under CT based on net obligation The calculation for the payment recission is as follows Billable quantity for payment rescission minimum of hourly ERR Prime or CT billable quantity CT billable quantity x price if an SC was paid for DA capacity HA capacity then price CT Settlment Amount CT Settlement Amount CT billable quantity CT billable quantity this is a weighted average price otherwise price MCP Comment detail will include total dollars allocated CRCommunications Client Relations Communications
New addition Cc NonPrivilegedpst Hi Keoni Would you please add Kit Blair to all of the applicable email lists He is a new addition to our group and will work closely with Caroline and I Thanks Donna

Regulation Up Cc NonPrivilegedpst Keoni Im noticing unusually high charges see below in Regulation Up CT in the manual tables The comments indicate that the charges are attributed to the Soft Price Cap Allocation Im not able to find any documentation on this Please forward any documentation you may have Thanks Donna

Settlement Statement File for Cc NonPrivilegedpst Keoni Is it possible to reload the Preliminary and Final Settlement Statements for trade Date Whats the timeline on that We need it ASAP Thanks so much Donna

January ISO Final Invoices Cc po NonPrivilegedpst Audrey The January Final Invoices are available The totals are as follows Grid Management Due to EPMI the afternoon of Market Operations Due to the ISO by am PST Ill fax the invoices to you please call me if you have any questions Thanks Donna x

RE EnronDecember Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Not sure if you received this Forwarded by Donna JohnsonPDXECT on AM Almeida Keoni on AM To De La Garza Chuck Chuck lPasocom Almeida Keoni cc Johnson Donna Subject RE EnronDecember Ive just received approval to go ahead with the adjustment which I will be submitting to Settlements today They are a bit behind so I dont expect the change to take place any day soon but I will keep it moving forward and keep you appraised Keep in mind that there is no adjustment for December th as OOM calls were only made for the th and th Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From De La Garza Chuck mailtoChuck lPasocom Sent Thursday March AM To Cc Subject EnronDecember Keoni I have been working with Donna Johnson at Enron in regards to several days in December where the CALISO paid El Paso Merchant Energy for some power that they should have given credit to Enron for The days in question are December For various hours on those days we sold the power from our San Joaquin plant to Enron Enron has already paid us for this power Below is a breakout of the hours that are in question Day hours Day hours and Day hours This was the Uninstructed Energy charge If there is anything else you need me to do please do not hesitate to contact me Chuck de la Garza This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
